original_text: Because of his faith, Abraham went to live like a stranger in that foreign country. God had promised to give that country to him, but Abraham lived there in tents. Isaac and Jacob also lived there in tents like strangers. God had also promised them that the land would belong to them one day.
korean_text: 믿음으로 그가 이방의 땅에 있는 것 같이 약속의 땅에 거류하여 동일한 약속을 유업으로 함께 받은 이삭 및 야곱과 더불어 장막에 거하였으니

sentences.original_text: Abraham went to live like a stranger
God had promised to give that country to him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 그 땅을 그에게 주시겠다고 약속하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: but Abraham lived there in tents
Isaac and Jacob also lived there in tents
that the land would belong to them one day
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 그 땅이 그들의 것이 될 것이라고
